name: Patient Care Monitoring System
tagline: Patient to caretaker IoT web monitoring interface for tracking patient prescription drug usage, providing notes, and pinging notifications.
body:
##Back-end RESTful API built with Node.js and MongoDB. ##Front-end web interface developed with React. #####Access deployed site at https://patient-care-web.herokuapp.com Note: automatic deploys from site-release branch
#####Access deployed API at https://patient-care-rest.herokuapp.com/api Note: automatic deploys from api-release branch
#####Running Patient Care React site locally: "npm install"
"npm start"
Access at localhost:3000
#####Integration with Raspberry Pi + DE2 FPGA developed by Alexander Swainson, Arnold Ip, and Rohit Sriram.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
